description: A loader for ngx-translate that loads translations using http
name: @ngx-translate/http-loader

scripts.clean: rimraf bundles coverage src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.metadata.json src/**/*.js tests/**/*.d.ts tests/**/*.metadata.json tests/**/*.js index.d.ts index.metadata.json index.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
